Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: ~jtclark unable to access https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/12065/. gerrit link. Could you please provide the access or make it public

Action.author: jtclark
Action.body: ~rameshthoomu - The link in my comment has an extra character in it. I've edited the link here on the JIRA task. Should work fine now.

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: ~jtclark As discussed in RC channel, please abandon this patch. Get rid of the existing hard coded values and implement the same logic with regular expressions. Please see my comments in the above patch. Thanks!!
